text:
Harris + Hoole - London (EC1Y), UK

Technology Guru - email hn@harrisandhoole.co.uk if you're interested!

We're looking for Tech hire #3 at a rapidly expanding coffee shop company. We are using technology to change the high street coffee shop experience.

If you want to be part of this exciting journey, check out the full job details here (http://goo.gl/He8rWU) or email me at hn@harrisandhoole.co.uk
